text: Hey <@U03647R6W3W>! I would recommend checking out our Marketplace Guidelines and developer docs: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/marketplace-guidelines>

help! i have a new (client) portal, boilerplate theme uploaded with no issues, a few marketplace/HS themes preloaded…. but no matter what theme or template I choose for my page, it loads the Growth homepage template.

even if i choose another template in Growth, it loads the homepage template. i’ve never had this happen before!

subscription is CMS Hub Professional

Hi all,
Would it be possible to hope in the near future to have borders for columns or rows as a choice in the tab style? Lately, the art directors I consult all make templates with bordered columns, and to do this, I have to create a custom module just for borders :disappointed: Thanks
You checked developer info to see what template ID it’s using? I might check base.html too

yeah, it was really using that one template. but i set up a second page, and on that one i could choose my theme and it’s working as expected with that one. I wonder if the first page in the portal defaulted to a standard theme; i definitely would *not* have selected growth if i’d been given the choice.
unfortunately that’s not the way it works :cry:
